radiographic_examinations.findings: Phlegmonous changes of the right lower quadrant centered about the region of the appendix. The appendix appears distended and hyperemic with an indistinct wall, concerning for gangrenous appendicitis. Thickening of the lateral conal and Gerota's fascia with adjacent ileocolic lymphadenopathy noted. No drainable fluid collections are identified. Visualized lung fields are within normal limits.
